fields.redirect_uri: The callback URL for your application

CheckNameAvailabilityParameter.description: Parameter supplied to check Namespace name availability operation

name.description: Name to check the namespace name availability

CheckNameAvailabilityResult.description: The Result of the CheckNameAvailability operation

message.description: The detailed info regarding the reason associated with the Namespace.

nameAvailable.description: Value indicating Namespace is availability, true if the Namespace is available; otherwise, false.

reason.description: The reason for unavailability of a Namespace.

ConsumerGroupCreateOrUpdateParameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Create Or Update Consumer Group operation.

ConsumerGroupListResult.description: The result to the List Consumer Group operation.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains incomplete list of Consumer Group

value.description: Result of the List Consumer Group operation.

ConsumerGroupProperties.description: Properties supplied to the Create Or Update Consumer Group operation.

createdAt.description: Exact time the message was created.

eventHubPath.description: The path of the Event Hub.

updatedAt.description: The exact time the message was updated.

ConsumerGroupResource.description: Single item in List or Get Consumer group operation

EventHubCreateOrUpdateParameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Create Or Update Event Hub operation.

EventHubListResult.description: The result of the List EventHubs operation.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains incomplete list of EventHubs.

value.description: Result of the List EventHubs operation.

EventHubProperties.description: Properties supplied to the Create Or Update Event Hub operation.

createdAt.description: Exact time the Event Hub was created.

messageRetentionInDays.description: Number of days to retain the events for this Event Hub.

partitionCount.description: Number of partitions created for the Event Hub.

partitionIds.description: Current number of shards on the Event Hub.

status.description: Enumerates the possible values for the status of the Event Hub.

updatedAt.description: The exact time the message was updated.

EventHubResource.description: Single item in List or Get Event Hub operation

NamespaceCreateOrUpdateParameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Create Or Update Namespace operation.

NamespaceListResult.description: The response of the List Namespace operation.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains incomplete list of namespaces.

value.description: Result of the List Namespace operation.

NamespaceProperties.description: Properties of the Namespace supplied for create or update Namespace operation

createdAt.description: The time the Namespace was created.

enabled.description: Specifies whether this instance is enabled.

serviceBusEndpoint.description: Endpoint you can use to perform Service Bus operations.

updatedAt.description: The time the Namespace was updated.

NamespaceResource.description: Single Namespace item in List or Get Operation

NamespaceUpdateParameter.description: Parameters supplied to the Patch/update Namespace operation.

sku.description: The sku of the created Namespace

Operation.description: A Event Hub REST API operation

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

operation.description: Operation type: Read, write, delete, etc.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Invoice, etc.

OperationListResult.description: Result of the request to list Event Hub operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

value.description: List of Event Hub operations supported by the Microsoft.EventHub resource provider.

RegenerateKeysParameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Regenerate Authorization Rule keys operation.

policykey.description: Key that needs to be regenerated.

keyName.description: A string that describes the AuthorizationRule.

primaryConnectionString.description: Primary connection string of the created Namespace AuthorizationRule.

primaryKey.description: A base64-encoded 256-bit primary key for signing and validating the SAS token.

secondaryConnectionString.description: Secondary connection string of the created Namespace AuthorizationRule.

secondaryKey.description: A base64-encoded 256-bit primary key for signing and validating the SAS token.

SharedAccessAuthorizationRuleCreateOrUpd.description: Parameters supplied to the Create Or Update Authorization Rules operation.

SharedAccessAuthorizationRuleListResult.description: The response from the List Namespace operation.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains an incomplete list of Authorization Rules

value.description: Result of the List Authorization Rules operation.

SharedAccessAuthorizationRuleProperties.description: Properties supplied to create or update SharedAccessAuthorizationRule

rights.description: The rights associated with the rule.

SharedAccessAuthorizationRuleResource.description: Single item in a List or Get AuthorizationRule operation

Sku.description: SKU parameters supplied to the create Namespace operation

tier.description: The billing tier of this particular SKU.

UnavailableReason.description: Specifies the reason for the unavailability of the service.

actions.title: Operations_List
actions.description: Lists all of the available Event Hub REST API operations.

actions.title: Namespaces_CheckNameAvailability
actions.description: Check the give Namespace name availability.

subscriptionId.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

actions.title: Namespaces_ListBySubscription
actions.description: Lists all the available Namespaces within a subscription, irrespective of the resource groups.

subscriptionId.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

actions.title: Namespaces_ListByResourceGroup
actions.description: Lists the available Namespaces within a resource group.

resourceGroupName.description: Name of the resource group within the azure subscription.

subscriptionId.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

actions.title: Namespaces_Delete
actions.description: Deletes an existing namespace. This operation also removes all associated resources under the namespace.

resourceGroupName.description: Name of the resource group within the azure subscription.

subscriptionId.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

actions.title: Namespaces_Get
actions.description: Gets the description of the specified namespace.

resourceGroupName.description: Name of the resource group within the azure subscription.

subscriptionId.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

actions.title: Namespaces_Update
actions.description: Creates or updates a namespace. Once created, this namespace's resource manifest is immutable. This operation is idempotent.

resourceGroupName.description: Name of the resource group within the azure subscription.

subscriptionId.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

actions.title: Namespaces_CreateOrUpdate
actions.description: Creates or updates a namespace. Once created, this namespace's resource manifest is immutable. This operation is idempotent.

resourceGroupName.description: Name of the resource group within the azure subscription.

subscriptionId.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

actions.title: Namespaces_ListAuthorizationRules
actions.description: Gets a list of authorization rules for a Namespace.

resourceGroupName.description: Name of the resource group within the azure subscription.

subscriptionId.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

actions.title: Namespaces_DeleteAuthorizationRule
actions.description: Deletes an AuthorizationRule for a Namespace.

resourceGroupName.description: Name of the resource group within the azure subscription.

subscriptionId.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

actions.title: Namespaces_GetAuthorizationRule
actions.description: Gets an AuthorizationRule for a Namespace by rule name.

resourceGroupName.description: Name of the resource group within the azure subscription.

subscriptionId.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

actions.title: Namespaces_CreateOrUpdateAuthorizationRule
actions.description: Creates or updates an AuthorizationRule for a Namespace.

resourceGroupName.description: Name of the resource group within the azure subscription.

subscriptionId.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

actions.title: Namespaces_ListKeys
actions.description: Gets the primary and secondary connection strings for the Namespace.

resourceGroupName.description: Name of the resource group within the azure subscription.

subscriptionId.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

actions.title: Namespaces_RegenerateKeys
actions.description: Regenerates the primary or secondary connection strings for the specified Namespace.

resourceGroupName.description: Name of the resource group within the azure subscription.

subscriptionId.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

actions.title: EventHubs_ListAll
actions.description: Gets all the Event Hubs in a Namespace.

subscriptionId.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
